siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Good news - No bad reviews on Reddit yet! Why did we skip trick or treating to go to a church service? We talk through some reasons in this episode. The big reason ends up being the hymns. (You might even catch Jon singing.) Bottom line is good hymns trump candy…

frontmatter.title: Episode 16 - The Best Podcast you Probably Won't Listen To

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Today we kick off the episode arguing semantics. Stan has yet another milkshake story. He attends a place with “Shake” in the name and is underwhelmed. Regular listener Tom, sent us an article via twitter for our (read: Stan’s) opinion. Hear us opine on the…

frontmatter.title: Episode 13 -  Apple Money Grab... or security concerns?

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, I’m not even really sure where to start for this episode. We cover a plethora of topics from tech to food, to reading non-fiction. You’re sure to find something that interests you in this episode (even if it only is the soothing sound of The Lemon’s voice) Maybe it…

frontmatter.title: Episode 12 - Where you're sure to find something that interests you

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, In this episode, Stan Lemon reviews Meat Rubs by Fenker (or.. Meat, Rubbed, and Salutary - branding pending.) Stan gives a good review but the only way to get them are to be friends with Rev. Aaron Fenker. Stan got new Apple Gear, much of the world got new apple…

frontmatter.title: Episode 11 - Meat Rubs, New Apple Toys, Investing 101

node.excerpt: Dear Listener who may in fact be sick of hearing us talk about milkshakes, This week we talk about Milkshakes! Stan’s Portillo’s milkshake to be exact. He had an interesting experience. He tells it better than I do. But this picture is referenced… Stan's portillo's milkshake…

Stan and Jon take a look at their current Apple products (specifically Mac) and workflows, talk about their history using Apple products, and take a look at the recently release MacBook Pro as they look toward purchasing updates. Listen in to hear how they use their devices and…
